mapper.select: Select u.nick, c1.ctn ctn, c2.ctn stateCtn, ch.* From challenge ch Inner Join user1 u On ch.user_num = u.user_num Inner Join comm c1 On ch.chg_lg = c1.lg And ch.chg_md = c1.md Inner Join comm c2 On ch.state_lg = c2.lg And ch.state_md = c2.md Where ch.chg_id = #{chg_id}
select * from board where brd_lg=700 AND brd_md=100 AND brd_step=0
mapper.insert: Insert Into board (BRD_NUM, title, conts, img, chg_id, user_num, brd_step, brd_lg, brd_md, REG_DATE, BRD_GROUP) values (BRD_NUM_SEQ.nextval, #{title}, #{conts}, #{img}, #{chg_id}, #{user_num}, 0, 700, 100, sysdate, BRD_NUM_SEQ.currval)
mapper.select: Select Count(*) From board b Inner Join challenge c On b.chg_id = c.chg_id Where brd_lg = 700 And brd_md = 100 And c.chg_id = #{chg_id} And brd_step = 0
